column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Survive a Festival
#Text=Glasto , Reading And Leeds or Download ?
#Text=Whatever festival you are going to , read this first !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Take wet wipes for your face .
#Text=This is a good idea because the showers at such festivals are slightly unhygienic and probably cold .
#Text=Do n't buy lunch , bring it packed in a cool pack .
#Text=This will keep it well refrigerated and you do n't have to sample any of the fast food stuff !

#Text=But if greasy spoons ( which are quite nice as an occasional treat ) are your thing , then take plenty of money because food and drinks there tend to be twice as much as the average KFC where you live .
#Text=Stay Safe .
#Text=If kids are coming with you , have them at your side at all times .
#Text=Children get lost very , very easily at these things and your child/children getting lost can be a very traumatic experience .
#Text=But if you do get lost , make sure you report it to one of the festival tents ; these should be located in several places around the grounds .
#Text=Also , a good tip is to write your mobile/cell phone number on your child 's arm so if someone can ring you if they find your child .
#Text=Make sure all your money is in your wallet , not in your tent .
#Text=It is a lot safer there than it is around the tent .
#Text=If you 're crowdsurfing be very careful . 12 % of A&E emergencies are due to dangerous actions at gigs .
#Text=If you are staying until Monday morning ( this is possible at Roskilde ) , do n't go too far away from your tent , or at least take all your belongings out of it .
#Text=Sunday night is bonfire night , and they might trash or burn your tent !
#Text=Alternatively , take it down ( if it 's worth taking down ) and leave at a cloakroom or in a car .
#Text=Put a brightly coloured ribbon around your tent to know where yours is .
#Text=Walking back from a gig in the middle of the night can be a real nightmare otherwise !
#Text=Take plenty of dry clothes !
#Text=Wet clothes can be horrific to wear the next day !
#Text=Most importantly do not be tempted to try any drugs regardless of what other people say .
#Text=They will completely wreck your festival experience and you could get very very much in trouble - by the police and getting hurt by using the drugs themselves .
#Text=Do n't get too wasted , you will forget your experience and wake up with a banging hangover : ( .
#Text=Keep a mobile ( cellphone ) with you at all times .
#Text=Never expect an on-site cashpoint .
#Text=Either they 're not there or the line is ten thousand miles long .
#Text=Last but not least , have fun !
#Text=Tips
#Text=Keep kids safe
#Text=Keep a phone on you
#Text=Bring plenty of clothes
#Text=Take out cash before going on site. .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Wear a condom , and do n't participate in oral sex .
#Text=People do n't wash , ok !
#Text=Do n't try drugs
